professional_experience.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Performed Root Cause Analysis (RCA) of maritime vessel delays and inefficiencies in report generation.
Automated report generation (Python, SQL), saving 10+ hours of weekly manual work.
Utilized data viz tools (Tableau, Superset) to create interactive dashboards, present findings to the clients.

professional_experience.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Automated report generation for 8 stakeholders (R, SQL), saving 10+ hours of monthly manual work.
Migrated existing data viz source code from legacy version to modern tech stack, 30% increase in efficiency.
Utilized data viz tool (R-Shiny) to create interactive dashboards, present findings to the clients.

research_experience.title: 3D Reconstruction from Single Images
responsibilities: Developed a novel algorithm for reconstructing 3D models from single images using deep learning techniques.
Implemented the algorithm in Python and evaluated its performance on benchmark datasets.
Presented research findings at a university conference.

projects.title: Correlated Topic Models: PyTorch Implementation
projects.description: Built an open-source implementation of CTMs using Automatic Differentiation Variational Inference (ADVI). Enabled batched training and ADVI to scale efficiently across large datasets in PyTorch. Achieved 10-15% faster processing times and 8-10% better accuracy for large batch sizes, outperforming popular libraries such as tomotopy, PyCTM, and topicmodels (which don’t use ADVI).

projects.title: Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) for Question Answering
projects.description: Developed a RAG system using Hugging Face Transformers and Faiss to answer questions based on a given context. Fine-tuned BERT for question answering and used Faiss for efficient retrieval of relevant documents.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis of Twitter Data
projects.description: Performed sentiment analysis on a dataset of tweets using Python and scikit-learn. Built a machine learning model to classify tweets as positive, negative, or neutral.
